justification: Acknowledges B trusts rankings, but ignores B’s strong injury aversion and urgency. Offers an OUT WR (Harris) while calling the deal injury-free—contradictory and misaligned with B’s risk profile. B also prefers pocket passers and already has a Tier 1 QB, reducing need for James Jones. Rationale is terse and factually off (Harris not a steady, available vet). Trade construction doesn’t fit B’s needs for immediate, healthy production.
